mc_MT_ITEMA Struct Reference

#include <mCtrl/mditab.h>


Data Fields

 Mask specifying which other members are valid.

 Text label of the tab.

 Number of characters in psxText. Used only on output.

Detailed Description

Structure for manipulating with tab item (ANSI version).
See also:
mc_MT_INSERTITEM mc_MT_DELETEITEM mc_MT_SETITEM mc_MT_GETITEM

Field Documentation

DWORD mc_MT_ITEMA::dwMask

Mask specifying which other members are valid.

Set to combination of MC_MTIF_TEXT, MC_MTIF_IMAGE and MC_MTIF_PARAM.
